title: The Abandoned Husband Dominates - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Harem   Romance   Seinen   Tragedy
tags: Adultery   Affair   Betrayal   Businessmen   Divorce   Emotionally Weak Protagonist   Hiding True Identity   Male Protagonist   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Revenge   Unrequited Love   Wealthy Characters
author: 朕有话要说
description:
After three years of being married to an unfaithful wife, the multi-billionaire is chased out of his home!

After the divorce...

His unfaithful ex-wife comes begging for forgiveness while she says, “I was wrong, please give me another chance!” >
